label: 一谷
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The site of the battle that took place in the early part of 1184, where Yoshitsune outflanked the Taira in a daring mounted charge down what had been thought to be an impassable cliff-like route behind the camp, routing the surprised Taira forces with heavy loss of life among the clan's leaders (p. 707). 「源義経、平]
